replies.body: Join my discord community :3 bronze-plat players here, and everyones organized by role mained with an elo tag. I hope to eventually make teams and scrim with eventual RP prizes. Just paste this in your browser https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFplGPy7D if you dont have the app downloaded. Message the owner with main role/rank when you get in :) thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
